title: Copilot Enterprise Introduces Search and Customized Best Practices
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Now in general availability, Copilot Enterprise unveils new features in the code assistant, marking an era of AI transformation, says GitHub vice president.
cntitle: Copilot Enterprise 推出搜索和定制最佳实践
cndescription: GitHub 副总裁表示，现在 Copilot Enterprise 已全面上市，代码助手推出了新功能，标志着人工智能转型时代。
